chapters.title: Chapter 6:  A Knack
chapters.info: Mandarb, p. 181—Lan's black stallion. His name means “Blade” in the Old Tongue. He is an extraordinary animal. He keeps true to his master's commands, even with Trolloc-inflicted wounds on his flank. See also t'Aybara, Faile ni Bashere; Mandragoran, Lan.
